description: I love to philosophise about my sexual preferences. Yes, I am into straight boys. And yes, I like blondes more. Maybe because I am blond myself. And unlike Jiri I am more into boys who have a job already rather than students.. The boy I met this day was blond and well - well, he didn´t have a job yet - but he wants to become a plumber. So far so good. I am still not sure if he was open minded or just stupid... it was really easy to make him show off, jerk and suck me. And not even expensive :-) Maybe he was even bi-curious but he insisted that he was straight. Anyway - he was a great catch. I will never forget how he was moaning and screaming when I fucked his little virgin-hole. Deal is deal.
title: Czech Hunter 88
